name: Resume Generator
desc: This web-application create and download your resume in short time. Built using ReactJs, NodeJs, netlify.

name: Foodie's World
desc: The Foodie's World Website is for the Foodie's people who has create and view their recipes. Built using Django Frameworks, sqlite3 and deploy on netlify.

name: Library-Management-system
desc: A library management software where librarian can add/view/delete books and student can view/issue/return books build on java swing and SQL database.

name: Predicting CreditCard Defaulters
desc: I have performed exercise including distribution analysis,EDA,model building to identify and predict Credit Card defaults using Customer's data on past payments.

name: Mask Detection System
desc: About Face Mask Detection system based on computer vision and deep learning using OpenCV and Tensorflow/Keras.

name: Face-recognition attendence system
desc: A Face Recognition Attendance System based on facial recognition built using Dlib library, OpenCV and Tkinter.

name: Rock_paper_Scissors Game
desc: Rock-Paper-Scissors Game Using OpenCv and mediapipe Hand Detector.

name: Employee Management System
desc: This is Employee Record Management System(ERMS) in pyhton Django ,ERMS use for viewing, maintaining the data of employees.

name: Virtual Calculator
desc: Virtual Calculator using Opencv python,this is based on the computer vision technique and used cvzone HandTrackingModule to track the finger position.

name: windows11 Clone
desc: Awe-amazing Windows 11 clone. Oh wait, Not for your Computer, but for the web!

name: Squid-game
desc: Red light green light game from squid game made using JavaScript and Three.js.

name: supplychain-application
desc: Supply Chain Management Using Hyperledger Fabric on hyperledger Composer under the blockchain development.
